li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-1226 current_page_item menu-item-1756

article.class: post-1226 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

div.p: Do you love to see the light in a student’s eyes and the smile of reassurance when new concepts are grasped for the first time? Do you inspire excellence as you work with every student at every level of ability? If the answers to these questions are “YES,” Camas School District could be the place for you!
The Camas School District posts all of its open positions online. All open positions can be viewed and applied for by clicking here.
div.h4: Current PSE, CAEOP, and Classified Employees:
div.p: If you are a current regular employee of the Camas School District, you will have to access this new system and complete a new application. The new application will ask for references, diplomas, licenses, etc. If we have these documents in your current personnel file, we can add these to your record for you. You must contact Human Resources (HR) after you have completed all other portions of your application if you would like us to upload that information for you.
Teachers will need to complete the online application for positions starting with the 2013-14 school year.

p.span: If you want to apply for any open, regular positions, you will need to complete the new online application. The new application will ask for references, diplomas, transcripts, licenses, etc. If we have these documents in your current substitute personnel file, we can add these to your record for you. You must contact HR after you have completed all other portions of your application if you would like help with that process.

div.p: For coaching positions, you will need to submit an online application if you are applying for another or new coaching position. The new application will ask for references, diplomas, transcripts, licenses, etc. If we have these documents in your current substitute personnel file, we can add these to your record for you. You must contact HR after you have completed all other portions of your application if you would like help.
div.h2: Would you like to become a substitute employee?
div.p: When we need substitutes, both certificated and classified, we post those positions on the online system. If you’d like to become a substitute, complete the application process for consideration. If there is no posting for a sub position, then we are not currently recruiting substitutes. Be sure to check back with us as our needs change during the year.
Thank you for your interest in employment with the Camas School District! If you have questions about the process or need assistance, you can call Human Resources at 360-335-3000.

div.div:
Linda Artman
Human Resources Specialist
